pageProps.title: English
pageProps.content:
#### Ways I use to learn English
1. I write blog, personal notes and tasks in English. It's good to stay at B2 level.
2. I speak at least 2 hours per week in English. It's good to stay at B2 level.
3. I learn new things using English. Let's see if it's a way to achieve C1 level.

#### Related notes
